name: Peeper
description:
A naughty remake of Leaper for GDKO round 5.

Controls:

Use A/D or Left/Right to move.

Press Space to Jump

How To Play:

Make your way up to the 'Peeper' sign, and light up each letter one by one to win.

When you light up a letter, you will be sent back to the bottom of the level.

Avoid the enemies: Rosehead will deal damage on impact, and the Croc will shoot fireballs which deal damage as well as deal damage on impact.

You have 5 lives, and if you lose all lives, the game will automatically reset.

Going offscreen will cause you to appear on the other side. This is true for the enemies too,

If an enemy gets stuck on the bottom ground, it will teleport back to the highest level after going off screen.
